Updates.Description: Updates List Hyper-V and Cluster version November 13, 2013

Update.Description: 2012-02-10 Windows 8 Client and Windows Server 2012 General Availability Update Rollup
2012-02-17 Poor performance when you enable RemoteFX in Hyper-V on a Windows Server 2012-based computer that uses AMD processors
2012-11-02 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 cumulative update: November 2012
2012-11-20 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 cumulative update: December 2012
2012-12-01 You cannot use the Cisco SR-IOV network adapter on a virtual machine in Windows Server 2012
2013-01-16 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: February 2013
2013-01-17 Failover Cluster Management snap-in crashes after you install update 2750149 on a Windows Server 2012-based failover cluster
2013-01-31 0x000000C2" Stop error when you try to back up a data deduplication-enabled volume in Windows 8 or Windows Server 2012
2013-02-01 Add-TargetPortToMaskingSet PowerShell command fails in Windows Server 2012
2013-02-02 You cannot log on to a virtual machine that is running Windows 8 or Windows Server 2012 in a VDI environment
2013-02-02 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 cumulative update: March 2013
2013-02-05 0x000000D1" Stop error on a virtual machine in Windows Server 2012
2013-03-02 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 cumulative update: April 2013
2013-03-04 Virtual machines freeze at the "Stopping" state after you shut down the virtual machines in Windows Server 2012
2013-03-05 Virtual switch extension cannot send packets separately through every individual network adapter in Windows Server 2012
2013-03-07 You cannot connect to a database stored in Windows Azure SQL Database in Windows Server 2012 (sic)
2013-04-03 You cannot perform an online backup operation by using Windows Server Backup in Windows Server 2012
2013-04-06 "0x00000050" Stop error when you try to create a virtual machine or copy a VHD or VHDX file to a SMB share in Windows Server 2012
2013-04-08 Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: May 2013
2013-04-11 You cannot add VHD files to Hyper-V virtual machines in Windows Server 2012
2013-05-04 Windows RT, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: June 2013
2013-05-07 Virtual machines crash or take a long time to complete the shutdown process on a Windows Server 2012-based host computer
2013-05-09 Can't access a resource that is hosted on a Windows 8 or Windows Server 2012-based failover cluster
2013-05-09 You cannot manage permissions or create virtual machines on a file share by using System Center 2012 SP1 VMM in Windows Server 2012
2013-05-10 Update improves cluster resiliency in Windows Server 2012
2013-05-20 Shared Nothing Live Migration fails when you try to migrate a virtual machine to a destination server in Windows Server 2012
2013-06-17 The last backup did not complete successfully" error message when you back up a Windows 8 system
2013-05-31 Computer does not shut down after you remove a virtual switch in Windows Server 2012
2013-07-12 Windows RT, Windows 8, and Windows Server 2012 update rollup: July 2013
2013-11-13 Clustered virtual machine cannot access LUNs over a Synthetic Fibre Channel after you perform live migration on Windows Server 2012-based Hyper-V hosts
2013-12-10 Clustered virtual machine cannot access LUNs over a Synthetic Fibre Channel after you perform live migration on Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2012 R2-based Hyper-V hosts
2013-12-12 System time of a virtual machine becomes incorrect after it crashes or resets in a 64 bit Windows 8-based or Windows Server 2012-based Hyper-V host
2013-12-12 Cross-page memory read or write operation crashes virtual machine that runs on 64-bit Windows 8-based or Windows Server 2012-based Hyper-V host
2014-01-09 A virtual machine that is configured to use the DLC protocol does not connect to an SNA host on Hyper-V Server 2012 or Hyper-V Server 2012 R2
2014-01-15 Stop error 0x9E in Windows Server 2012 or Windows 8
2014-01-15 OffloadWrite is doing PrepareForCriticalIo for the whole VHD in a Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V host
2014-01-15 Hyper-V storage migration fails when you try to migrate VHD and configuration files to CSV volumes in Windows Server 2012
2014-01-15 Standard replica is created unexpectedly after you restart the VMMS service in Windows Server 2012
